LambdaFunctions.description: Send reminders to members enrolled with OXBH who have not accessed the member portal within the last 45 days
Initiate a reminder to members 60 days after the commencement of a chronic episode

REMINDER_EVENT : Send reminders to members enrolled with OXBH who have not accessed the member portal within the last 45 days
